entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
